documents.document: @CmonHarris Would pay 50p for a larger Freddo. Would rather that than the shit Dairy Milks they make these days.

@nisummers HELLO. Is it out yet?
Probably my favourite issue yet. Everyone bought their A game and it looks awesome for it! https://t.co/rkaMxcv3YT
25mph winds in Edinburgh today so obviously I’m really looking forward to my flight down south later. 🙃
@fernlzbth Would 100% recommend Aziz Ansari’s Modern Romance if you want some non-fiction and haven’t read it. Dead good.
@MauleBrewingCo Done!
@kpriestley90 NICE! Also, I’m super intrigued about your freelance-related plans!

@fubarpops Highly recommend the Paramore Live Spotify playlist. Is my go-to running music.
@fubarpops Next Paramore gig. We go.
@ATTNMagazine Checked out that Solange album today. Pretty great!
iPhone 6s/7 user? Have a read of @macstories' 3D Touch for Power Users. It's a super thoughtful and useful guide. https://t.co/uSmbRcTqil
My 27th birthday will be remembered as the one when @fubarpops baked me a delicious cake and Twitter went mad over @CmonHarris’ photo of it.
I know I say this a lot about his work, but The candy diet by @sethgodin is seriously important reading. https://t.co/P5LWbjritG
@saaamgiles it is! And thaaaaanks!
@CmonHarris it’s alright mate I’m a pro at this. @iamdanduke & I often have the ‘are you going to wear the denim shirt?’ chat before shows.
#NowPlaying Rango II by Vulfpeck (All Vulfpeck is great, not just this song. Perfect birthday music tbh.) ♫ https://t.co/fXkYfV1C3o
Bloody love them both, btw. Also think I might end up looking like @CmonHarris wearing the one on the right, no bad thing.
You know you’ve turned 27 when you get two woollen jumpers for your birthday. https://t.co/NqFiKLpcaB
@iamsamnorman it was all downhill from the Christmas party tbh
@CmonHarris I used to do work for someone in Uxbridge, thought it was them, picked up, extra fiver on my bill. Bullshit.
@CmonHarris Sadly this one is one of those bullshit ‘You’ve had an accident’ lines that costs you £50 a second to answer.

@fubarpops But for now, Invisibilia.

.@katemcstraw @walshpjames @lizzy_maries @iamdanduke yr all great and help me out even when you don’t know it. Thanks. #TimetoTalk
Speaking of excellent pals who keep me right when I feel like a terrible freelancer…
Anyway, what I’m saying is, if you’re freelancing and feeling shit about it. It’s not unusual or a sign of you being bad at it. #TimetoTalk
I know I suffer from this and fortunately I’m lucky enough to have some excellent freelancing friends to give me perspective. #TimetoTalk
Or when you’re feeling massively overwhelmed by a job and convince yourself you’re doomed. There’s no line manager to help out. #TimetoTalk
And that’s a bummer when you’ve not got a colleague sitting next to you to put you right. #TimetoTalk
One of the hardest things about being a freelancer is occasionally feeling like you’re utterly shit at your job. #TimetoTalk
